text: Bechstein is a German surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Carl Bechstein, German piano manufacturer who founded C. Bechstein Pianofortefabrik *Helene Bechstein (1876–1951), German socialite and businesswoman *Johann Matthäus Bechstein (1757–1822), German naturalist and forester *Ludwig Bechstein (1801–1860), German writer Category:German-language surnames de:Bechstein
title: Bechstein
